testcase.name: The user can retrieve the list of devices from the server app
testcase.system-out: Given the user wants to retrieve the list of devices from the server........passed When the user requests the list of devices from the server..................passed Then the user gets the list of devices from the server......................passed

testcase.name: The user can verify the list of devices returned by the server are displayed in the client app
testcase.system-out: Given the user has retrieved the list of devices from the server............passed When the user checks for the devices in the list in the client app..........passed Then the user can verify the id of each device is displayed in the UI.......passed And the user can verify the name of each device is displayed in the UI......passed And the user can verify the type of each device is displayed in the UI......passed And the user can verify the capacity of each device is displayed in the UI..passed
